dmca.title: Copyright Claim
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Natalie Kelsey [mailto:winterdigitalarts@gmail.com] 
Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2007 3:33 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Claim

 

To Whom It May Concern,

This is to advise you that a company you web-host for, Pyzam, 
www.pyzam.com, is using copyrighted and protected material on their
website and offering it for distribution to others. This illegal use of
my artworks, Blossoming Joy and Urban Feathers, at 
http://www.pyzam.com/backgrounds/code/678, and 
http://www.pyzam.com/backgrounds/code/692 is originally from my website
called DragonWinter at www.dragonwinter.deviantart.com. This is original
content and I am the artist and copyright holder. Use of copyright
protected material without permission is illegal under copyright laws. 

Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act, I am informing you that the
original internet posting of my artworks can be found at 
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/46255325 and 
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/46029172/. Both the original date of
posting and my copyright stamp are on these pages. The first piece is a
purple fractal flower on a black background. The original has my
watermarks on it; those at Pyzam.com that stole this content have
obscured the watermarks by turning the piece upside down and cropping
them out. The second piece is a bronze/beige/black fractal swirl on a
white background. The watermarks on this piece have also been cropped
out. 

I am including with this post the reply I recieved from an owner
operator at Pyzam.com, in which they state that they refuse to remove
the artwork in question and in which they specifically state that they
use deviantART.com as a harvesting ground to obtain artwork without
specific artist permission. I am also including a digital file of my
physical signature.

You may contact me with your reply at:

Natalie Kelsey
winterdigitalarts@gmail.com
http://dragonwinter.deviantart.com

97 Canterbury St
Billerica, MA 01821
978-663-9187 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my
copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the
information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright
owner of an exclusive right that is infringed. 

Your prompt reply is expected and appreciated.

Natalie Kelsey
25 February 2007 

-- 
http://dragonwinter.deviantart.com/store
